title: Diablo 20th Anniversary Website
body: The Diablo franchise turned 20 years old on December 31, 2016, so we launched a retrospective site with lots of great imagery from over the years. I’m a huge fan of the franchise so I’m proud to honor its history.

There aren’t any new processes or technologies on display here, but because of this, we were able to use a process and technology that we were very comfortable with to turn out a high-quality page quickly and on schedule, with a very lean team.
